topic:
请帮我分析如下ctf题目 : from Crypto.Util.number import *
 flag = b'flag{******}'
 class LCG:
 def __init__(self, seed, a, b, m):
 self.seed = seed
 self.a = a
 self.b = b
 self.m = m
 def generate(self):
 self.seed = (self.a * self.seed + self.b) % self.m
 return self.seed
 lcg = LCG(bytes_to_long(flag), getPrime(256), getPrime(256), getPrime(256))
 for i in range(getPrime(16)):
 lcg.generate()
 print(f'a = {lcg.a}')
 print(f'm = {lcg.m}')
 print(lcg.generate())
 print(lcg.generate())
